text:
According to DOM Level 2 specification (1.1.8): "The new methods, such as
createElementNS and createAttributeNS of the Document interface, are meant to be
used by namespace aware applications.". SVG being a namespace aware application
the NS version of the methods have to be used. See also in 1.1.8: "DOM Level 1
methods are namespace ignorant. Therefore, while it is safe to use these methods
when not dealing with namespaces, using them and the new ones at the same time
should be avoided."
